body_html:
Thanks for creating this issue @vincentvanhoucke! Just a note that I had to modify the Dockerfile to get this working myself. The modified file looked like the following:

FROM gcr.io/tensorflow/tensorflow:latest
MAINTAINER Vincent Vanhoucke <vanhoucke@google.com>
RUN pip install scikit-learn pyreadline Pillow==2.3.0
RUN rm -rf /notebooks/*
ADD *.ipynb /notebooks/
WORKDIR /notebooks
CMD ["/run_jupyter.sh"]

I pinned Pillow to the version from the current 0.5.0 container. Pillow 3.x requires some updated libraries and I wasn't able to figure out how to install them in the container.

Thanks again!

body:
Thanks for creating this issue @vincentvanhoucke! Just a note that I had to modify the `Dockerfile` to get this working myself. The modified file looked like the following:

``` bash
FROM gcr.io/tensorflow/tensorflow:latest
MAINTAINER Vincent Vanhoucke <vanhoucke@google.com>
RUN pip install scikit-learn pyreadline Pillow==2.3.0
RUN rm -rf /notebooks/*
ADD *.ipynb /notebooks/
WORKDIR /notebooks
CMD ["/run_jupyter.sh"]
```

I pinned Pillow to the version from the current 0.5.0 container. Pillow 3.x requires some updated libraries and I wasn't able to figure out how to install them in the container.

Thanks again!
